name: Mr. Robot Season 4
info:
• 中文名: 黑客军团 第四季
  • 放送星期: 星期日
  • 集数: 12
  • 开始: 2019-10-06
  • 类型: 剧情 / 犯罪
  • 国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 首播国家: 美国

  • 编剧: Sam Esmail
  • 主演: Carly Chaikin, Portia Doubleday, Rami Malek

eps.name: 401 Unauthorized
eps.desc: xmas time. elliot+mrrobot are BAK. darlene deals with real sh*t. tyrell's bored. dom's paranoid AF.

eps.name: 402 Payment Required
eps.desc: elliot + darlene come together. dom gets dark army vibes. wtf is deus group? price has answers.

eps.name: 403 Forbidden
eps.desc: whiterose has the feels. elliot gets owned by his own hack. an old foe chillz in wait.

eps.name: 404 Not Found
eps.desc: elliot, mrrobot, and tyrell walkin' in a winter wonderland. darlene meets a bad santa. dom is DTF.

eps.name: 405 Method Not Allowed
eps.desc: no xmas lolz for dom. darelliot gives a run-around. krista plays hookie. quiet pls, the show is on.

eps.name: 406 Not Acceptable
eps.desc: vera tells a tale. darlene gets an xmas surprise. elliot goes rogue.

eps.name: 408 REQUEST TIMEOUT
eps.desc: janice wants all the deets. elliot is shook.

eps.name: eXit
eps.desc: enuf is enuf. elliot goes to the washington township power plant.

eps.name: Series Finale Part 1; Series Finale Part 2
eps.desc: Parts one and two of the series finale.
